fields.name: SubmitSON
fields.fieldText: In this section, you will be asked to detail your Statement of Needs for the new program proposal. Please select your Divisional VP and fill in the details to move the process through the Steering Committee and Investment Development Group

fields.name: ShowDetailsTextSON
fields.fieldText: This step has been completed {!CompletedFlowCounter_SON} times previously. Most recently completed by {!GetFirst_for_SON.outputMember.User__r.FirstName} {!GetFirst_for_SON.outputMember.User__r.LastName} , and was most recently completed by on {!GetFirst_for_SON.outputMember.CreatedDate}

fields.name: Investment_Development_Text
fields.fieldText: In this section, you will be asked to detail your Investment Development plan for the new program proposal. Please fill in the details to move the process through the Divisional VP, Steering Committee, AAC and the Board.

fields.name: ShowDetailsText_INV
fields.fieldText: This step has been completed {!submissionCount_INV} times previously. Recently completed by {!GetFirst_INV.outputMember.User__r.FirstName} {!GetFirst_INV.outputMember.User__r.LastName} , and was most recently completed by on {!GetFirst_INV.outputMember.CreatedDate}

variables.description: Counts the number of flows that were completed
variables.name: CompletedFlowCounter_SON
